plot ggnet

Source: R/plot_ggnet.R
plot_ggnet.Rd

plot ggnet

Usage

plot_ggnet(
  ggnet_obj,
  fill = "none",
  shape = "none",
  node_size = 4,
  text_size = 4,
  labels = FALSE,
  label_inc = "",
  label_exc = "",
  connected = TRUE
)

Arguments

ggnet_obj

ggnetwork dataframe

fill

vertex attribute for node fill

shape

vertex attribute for node shape

node_size

node size

text_size

label size

labels

add labels

label_inc

regular expression to include labels

label_exc

regular expression to exclude labels

connected

boolean to include isolated nodes

Value

ggnetwork plot

Examples

example_ggnet <- ggnetwork::ggnetwork(example_network)
plot_ggnet(example_ggnet)
#> Scale for fill is already present.
#> Adding another scale for fill, which will replace the existing scale.
#> Scale for shape is already present.
#> Adding another scale for shape, which will replace the existing scale.
